title: Vr headset setting
content:
Have cardboard VR headset box.
Not Google cardboard.
Tried it out with a VR panorama.
Not quite right, so went to settings, where I chose Daydream, as one of the possible choices.
Pop-up appears, requiring me to install Daydream, or cancel.
If I cancel, PHOTOS drops out of VR to ordinary photo thumbnail, not back to SETTINGS within VR.
I can't get back into VR settings to switch back to a cardboard headset.
If I open the VR thumbnail again, the pop-up appears, again, requiring a Daydream install.
So, tried installing DAYDREAM, which then said it needed a Daydream Keyboard install.
Uninstalled Daydream, but VR still set expecting a Daydream headset - so the pop-up appears, again.
Can't get past this pop-up, back to VR settings.
New to Android and the Pixel 3, and stuck.
Any ideas?
